Name: Tetsoidea Eternal
About the game: Follow Evelyn and company in this delightful RPG to determine the whereabouts of the other heroes of the realm of Tetsoidea. Engage in difficult encounters, easy encounters, and laughable encounters. Travel through a variety of settings spanning 35+ maps. Talk to people, horses, and dogs. Do whatever you feel like, so long as you vanquish the evil that has spread throughout the land. This is an old-school styled RPG flavored with strange humor, fast-paced turn based combat, and a wide variety of abilities to take down your foes with. Controls: Arrow Keys = movement. Enter = interact/select. Escape = menu. Hold Shift = Dash. F4 = Fullscreen. Hold enter in combat = Speed up attack order. Features: Colorful characters that you will become addicted to. Learn combo abilities that compliment each other. Some pretty difficult bosses towards the end. Apply weird items to your characters to boost their stats.
